seo.title: FindMyStuff | Bringing back lost objects
seo.description: Find lost object through innovative use of QR code
seo.keywords: lost, object, phone, smartphone, gsm, track, find, qr, code, find, my, stuff, forget, keys, wallet, bag, found

heading: Bringing back lost objects.
description: FindMyStuff helps to get your lost items back through an innovative QR code based system. Just set stickers and keychain containing the QR code on your personal objects.

hiw.title: How It Works
hiw.step1: FindMyStuff offers a pack containing stickers and a keychain with an unique QR code with the mention 'SCAN ME IF I'M LOST' engraved.
hiw.step2: Anyone who finds your lost item can now scan the QR code and report the finding. We will indicate to him the 1 400 associated pickup parcelpoints in Belgium where he will be able to deposit your item for a monetary reward.
hiw.step3: Just wait for your item to get back. You will be notified when it will be delivered into your favorite pickup parcelpoint that you have chosen during the activation. The first return is free.

why.title: Lost objects in numbers
why.desc: In Belgium, millions of objects are lost and never found back by their owners. FindMyStuff proposes a solution to this problem.
why.d2: Lost objects in the bus per year.
why.d3: Lost objects in the train per year.
why.d4: Lost objects in the airport per year.
why.v1: You pay a fixed price, no need of a membership.
why.v2: You just need to have a smartphone and scan QR code
why.v3: The system works without any electrical components.
why.v4: The finder has no informations about the owner.

pro.d1: Are you in insurance, real estate, leasing, events, ... and seeking for a trustworthy partner ?
pro.d2: We will be more than happy to provide a flexible to solution to your needs.

cookie.d1: We use cookies to ensure that the website works correctly and to analyze our traffic. If you continue to use our website, you agree to the usage of the cookies.
